title: This legacy SF waterfront restaurant started with 6 stools and a car salesman
description: Scoma's, the historic SF restaurant on Pier 47 in Fisherman's Wharf, turns 60 this year and has served celebrities including Michael Jordan, Brad Pitt and U2.
content:
They say the children of restaurant families grow up in the business. Its certainly true for Sancia Scoma.

title: Stonestown is now home to San Francisco’s sweatiest party
